title: Russian conscript opens fire to kill eight soldiers
text:
The shooting happened in the Transbaikal region on Friday at around 4pm local time.

A Russian soldier has shot dead eight fellow soldiers at a military base in eastern Siberia.

It is believed that the soldier - who had served for four months - was a conscript and may have been suffering from mental health problems. He has since been detained.

The shooting happened in the Transbaikal region on Friday at around 4pm local time.

According to reports from local outlets the soldier, who is described as a “young man”, aimed his victim’s heads before shooting wounded colleagues with controlled shots.

The soldier - whose name has not been released - was guarding the base at the time.

Deputy Defence Minister Andrey Kartapolov is flying to the area to investigate the incident.

The Telegraph have contacted the Ministry of Defence of the Russian Federation for a comment.
description: A Russian soldier has shot dead eight fellow soldiers at a military base in eastern Siberia.
